description: Create a job production plan service type unit of measure cohort link

flags.description: Service type unit of measure cohort ID (required)
flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure-cohort

permissions: Requires access to the associated job production plan via delegated authorization.
side_effects: Creates a job production plan service type unit of measure cohort link.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan and --service-type-unit-of-measure-cohort are required. The relationship fields are create-only.
